articles.title: Afghan national is suspect in Guard ambush shooting; 2 troops ID’d and charges mount, officials say
articles.description:
The guard members shot were Specialist Sarah Beckstrom, 20, and Staff Sgt. Andrew Wolfe, 24.

articles.title: Lexington man exposes school district for intentionally overestimating costs of public records
articles.description:
Kyle York has long had concerns about how business is done at Lexington Public Schools. Dissatisfied with how the district supported his daughter with dyslexia, York began requesting a series of records last April. Jumping off another parent’s research, soon he was seeking expense invoices that would explain, for example, how the administration spent tens […]
